Virds got tiny little wings and needs your help. Tap like crazy, fly like a bird a get your pet dragon as far as you can through all the block shuriken obstacles.

FEATURES
- Super addictive and simple game play.
- Save your top score and number of deaths.
- Great NES / SNES style graphics.
- Cute and catchy music.

WHAT PLAYERS ARE SAYING
- "Its obviously a flappy bird style game but improves the physics A LOT. I like that it also saves the number of deaths. and thank god i can start the game quicker, don't need to wait for the pop up or menu screen" - Ninja Plane Gamer - Jan 2 2014

- "This is so hard but so fun. been playing it class today haha. why are shuriken block things in the air though?, why not trees or pipes?" - cutey bird - Feb 2 2014


Players who love flappy bird or ironpants will love this game too.
